title: Cosmic Swirls.
content:
Welcome to Cosmic Swirls, the ultimate destination for space enthusiasts! Our website features stunning abstract images of deep space objects, such as black holes and pulsars, with swirling colors and patterns that will leave you in awe. 

Explore our collection of high-quality wallpapers and find the perfect one to decorate your desktop or mobile device. Whether you're a scientist, an artist, or simply someone who appreciates the beauty of the cosmos, our wallpapers are sure to inspire you and spark your imagination.

Stay up-to-date with the latest discoveries and news from the world of astronomy and astrophysics by checking out our blog section. We cover everything from new exoplanet discoveries to the latest developments in space exploration technology.

Join our community of space lovers and share your passion for the universe with like-minded individuals. Follow us on social media and be the first to know about our latest updates and releases.

Experience the wonder and majesty of the cosmos every day with Cosmic Swirls.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a deep space object, such as a black hole or pulsar, with swirling colors and patterns."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
